mapper.insert: insert into notification( notifier, receiver, outerId, type, gmt_create, status, question_id ) values( #{notifier}, #{receiver}, #{outerId}, #{type}, unix_timestamp(now()), 0, #{questionId} )
mapper.select: select count(1) from notification where receiver = #{receiver} and status = 0

select n.id id, n.notifier notifier, n.receiver receiver, n.outerId outerId, n.type type, n.gmt_Create gmtCreate, n.status status, n.question_id questionId, u.name notifierName, q.title questionTitle, c.content content, (case n.type when 1 then '回复了您的问题' when 2 then '回复了您的评论' when 3 then '点赞了您的评论' end ) typeName from notification n left join comment c on c.id = n.outerId left join user u on u.id = n.notifier left join question q on q.id = n.outerId where n.receiver = #{receiver} order by n.ID desc limit #{size} offset #{offset}
